Today, the Causeway Coast is experiencing poor conditions with a hefty 7 ft @15s WNW swell, but fresh 21 mph S winds are making it blown out. Tomorrow, the swell remains similar at 7 ft @12s WNW, with even stronger 25 mph SW winds, keeping it messy. On the day after, the swell drops to 5 ft @10s WNW, but the 28 mph SSE winds continue to create challenging conditions. Best: today.
